solution.ProvisionFailGuide: Provision resources failed, subscription id: '%s', resource group: '%s'. You can choose to rollback to delete the resource group and redo provision.
solution.ProvisionFailNotice: fail to provision '%s' in the cloud!
solution.DeployFailNotice: fail to deploy '%s' to the cloud!
solution.PublishSuccessNotice: '%s' successfully published to the admin portal. Once approved, your app will be available for your organization
solution.PublishFailNotice: fail to publish '%s' to the admin portal.
solution.AskProvisionBeforeDeployOrPublish: The toolkit has not provisioned resources to deploy. Do you want to provision in the cloud first?
solution.AddResourceNotice: [Teams Toolkit] Resource "%s" have been successfully configured for your project, trigger 'TeamsFx - Provision in the Cloud' will create the resource(s) in your Azure subscription.
solution.AddCapabilityNotice: [Teams Toolkit] Capability "%s" have been successfully configured for your project, trigger 'TeamsFx - Provision in the Cloud' will create the resource(s) in your Azure subscription.

SPFx.deployNotice: [Teams Toolkit] Please go to SharePoint tenant App Catalog site at https://{your SharePoint App Catalog site}/AppCatalog/Forms/AllItems.aspx to deploy your package. You can find your SharePoint package at %s. Read more about how to deploy your SharePoint package from https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/dev/spfx/web-parts/get-started/using-web-part-as-ms-teams-tab.
